segments.text: There’s a warmth to the scene, but it’s laced with tension as well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman, calm and collected, seemingly in another world as the water spills over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy’s determination is palpable, his ambition to reach those cookies evident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It angers me that she’s so caught up in the mundane that she misses the mischief brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the puddle forming, a silent warning of the wet chaos to come.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks inviting, contrasting sharply with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant posture adds to the pressure of the moment; she’s counting on her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR
